Verses: 1 engalai Naangale Marupadiyum Mechchikkollath Thodangugiromo Alladhu Silarukku Vendiyadhaayirukkiradhupola, Ungalukku Ubasaara Nirubangalai Anuppavum, Ungalidaththil Ubasaara Nirubangalaip Petrukkollavum Engalukku Vendiyadho?
2 engal Irudhayangalil Ezhudhappattum, Sagala Manusharaalum Arindhu Vaasikkappattum Irukkira Engal Nirubam Neengaldhaane.

3 enenil Neengal Engal Oozhiyaththinaal Undaagiya Kiristhuvin Nirubamaayirukkireergalendru Veliyarangamaayirukkiradhu; Adhu Maiyinaalalla, Jeevanulla Dhevanudaiya Aaviyinaalum; Karpalagaigalilalla, Irudhayangalaagiya Sadhaiyaana Palagaigalileyum Ezhudhappattirukkiradhu.
4 naangal Dhevanukku Munbaagak Kiristhuvin Moolamaai Ippadippatta Nambikkaiyaik Kondirukkirom.
5 engalaal Edhaagilum Aagum Enbadhupola Ondrai Yosikkiradharku Naangal Engalaale Thaguthiyaanavargal Alla; Engaludaiya Thagudhi Dhevanaal Undaayirukkiradhu.

6 pudhu Udanpadikkaiyin Oozhiyakkaararaayirukkumpadi, Avare Engalaith Thaguthiyullavargalaakkinaar; Andha Udanpadikkai Ezhuththirkuriyadhaayiraamal, Aavikkuriyadhaayirukkiradhu; Ezhuththu Kollugiradhu, Aaviyo Uyirppikkiradhu.

7 ezhuththugalinaal Ezhudhappattuk Karkalil Padhindhirundha Maranaththukkedhuvaana Oozhiyaththai Seydha Moseyinudaiya Mugaththile Magimaippiragaasam Undaanapadiyaal, Isravel Puththirar Avan Mugaththai Nokkip Paarkkakkoodaadhirundhaargale.
8 ozhindhupogira Magimaiyaiyudaiya Andha Oozhiyam Appadippatta Magimaiyulladhaayirundhaal, Aavikkuriya Oozhiyam Evvalavu Adhiga Magimaiyulladhaayirukkum?
9 aakkinaiththeerppuk Kodukkum Oozhiyam Magimaiyulladhaayirundhaal, Needhiyaik Kodukkum Oozhiyam Adhiga Magimaiyulladhaayirukkume.
10 ippadiyaaga, Magimaippattirundha Andha Oozhiyam Indha Oozhiyaththirku Undaayirukkira Sirandha Magimaikkumunbaaga Magimaippattadhalla.
11 andriyum Ozhindhupovadhe Magimaiyulladhaayirundhadhaanaal, Nilaiththiruppadhu Adhiga Magimaiyulladhaayirukkume.
12 naangal Ippadippatta Nambikkaiyudaiyavargalaadhalaal, Migavum Dhaaraalamaaip Pesugirom.
13 melum Ozhindhupovadhin Mudivai Isravel Buththirar Nokkippaaraadhapadikku, Mose Than Mugaththinmel Mukkaadu Pottukkondadhupola Naangal Podugiradhillai.
14 avargaludaiya Manadhu Kadinappattadhu; Innaalvaraikkum Pazhaiya Erpaadu Vaasikkappadugaiyil, Andha Mukkaadu Neengaamalirukkiradhu; Adhu Kiristhuvinaale Neekkappadugiradhu.
15 moseyin Aagamangal Vaasikkappadumpodhu, Innaalvaraikkum Mukkaadu Avargal Irudhayaththinmel Irukkiradhe.
16 avargal Karththaridaththil Mananthirumbumpodhu, Andha Mukkaadu Edupattuppom.
17 karththare Aaviyaanavar; Karththarudaiya Aavi Engeyo Ange Vidudhalaiyumundu.

18 naamellaarum Thirandha Mugamaaik Karththarudaiya Magimaiyaik Kannaadiyile Kaandiradhupolak Kandu, Aaviyaayirukkira Karththaraal Andha Saayalaagaththaane Magimaiyinmel Magimaiyadaindhu Maruroobappadugirom.
